abstract: Microsoft’s search engine adds a feature that allows users to browse search results as thumbnail images rather than snippets of text.
snippet: Microsoft’s search engine adds a feature that allows users to browse search results as thumbnail images rather than snippets of text.
lead_paragraph: In an effort to allow search users to go through large volumes of data more quickly, Microsoft on Monday unveiled a new feature on its search engine, Bing, which it calls Visual Search. The feature allows users to browse through images rather than text snippets.
